video.title: Into the Badlands
video.synopsis: Dreaming of escaping to a distant city, a ferocious warrior and a mysterious boy tangle with territorial warlords and their highly trained killers.

episodes.synopsis: A boy with mysterious powers is rescued by Badlands clipper Sunny, who is having doubts about what he does, despite being close to a powerful baron.
episodes.title: The Fort

episodes.synopsis: While the Widow plots her strategy against Quinn, M.K. finds temporary sanctuary. Quinn receives news that prompts him to test Sunny's loyalty.
episodes.title: Fist Like a Bullet

episodes.synopsis: Quinn and his men attack the Widow's home. Veil is summoned to heal Ryder. Sunny takes M.K. to train with Waldo, a former clipper in a wheelchair.
episodes.title: White Stork Spreads Wings

episodes.synopsis: The Widow and her daughters prepare for war, while Veil offers Quinn some hope. Sunny trains M.K. and secretly plans an escape from the Badlands.
episodes.title: Two Tigers Subdue Dragons

episodes.synopsis: M.K. learns more about controlling his powers. After the Widow recruits Quinn's cogs, he plots revenge. Jade and the Baroness begin to work together.
episodes.title: Snake Creeps Down

episodes.synopsis: Quinn makes decisions on loyalty. Tilda seeks Veil's help for the Widow. M.K. and Sunny face the consequences of their quest to leave the Badlands.
episodes.title: Hand of Five Poisons

episodes.synopsis: Stuck in a life of misery as a picker, Sunny forges new bonds and makes a powerful enemy. While training, M.K. seeks information on the Master.
episodes.title: Tiger Pushes Mountain

episodes.synopsis: With Bajie shackled to him, Sunny faces a terrifying foe. Meanwhile, M.K. takes an uncomfortable journey into his own history.
episodes.title: Force of Eagle's Claw

episodes.synopsis: While traversing the wilds, Sunny and Bajie cross paths with a formidable swordsman. The Widow draws up plans for a critical confrontation.
episodes.title: Red Sun, Silver Moon

episodes.synopsis: As Quinn prepares for a brutal mission, The Widow schemes to retain control of her position, despite daunting odds.
episodes.title: Palm of the Iron Fox

episodes.synopsis: Following a painful loss, Jade takes on a new role. Bajie introduces Sunny to a powerful metal trader, who is suitably impressed. Quinn has a vision.
episodes.title: Monkey Leaps Through Mist

episodes.synopsis: Quinn makes Lydia a tempting offer, but is she angry enough to take it? Bajie and Sunny visit a man with unique talents.
episodes.title: Leopard Stalks in Snow

episodes.synopsis: In a perilous state, Sunny experiences a telling dream. Meanwhile, his friends -- including M.K. -- desperately search for a way to help.
episodes.title: Black Heart, White Mountain

episodes.synopsis: Sunny, M.K. and Bajie arrive at the wall but find that their journey is just beginning. Later, Quinn receives distressing news.
episodes.title: Sting of the Scorpion's Tail

episodes.synopsis: At the Sanctuary, Sunny seeks help from the Widow, who plans an attack on their shared enemy: Quinn. Also, Tilda delivers a painful truth.
episodes.title: Nightingale Sings No More

episodes.synopsis: In the season finale, Quinn and Sunny prepare for a bloody battle, M.K. questions Bajie's loyalties, and Veil is forced to make an impossible choice.
episodes.title: Wolf's Breath, Dragon Fire

episodes.synopsis: Sunny reconnects with Bajie to search for a cure for Henry. The Widow sets out to recruit Moon in her war against Chau.
episodes.title: Enter the Phoenix

episodes.synopsis: Sunny and Bajie ask Lydia for assistance. Pilgrim searches for a new kingdom within the Badlands. The Widow faces problems with M.K.
episodes.title: Moon Rises, Raven Seeks

episodes.synopsis: Sunny and Bajie venture into dangerous territory in hopes of finding a cure for Henry. Moon takes steps to lure and capture the Iron Rabbit.
episodes.title: Leopard Snares Rabbit

episodes.synopsis: Chau makes her imprisoned brother an offer. Sunny faces a painful memory and a difficult choice. The Widow and Lydia seek out Pilgrim.
episodes.title: Blind Cannibal Assassins

episodes.synopsis: The Widow confronts a face from her past. Sunny and Bajie ascend Vulture's Peak, seeking answers. Chau faces a difficult deadline.
episodes.title: Carry Tiger to Mountain

episodes.synopsis: Bajie drops in on a smuggler he once knew rather well. Sunny has a troubling vision. Tilda seeks a truce with the Widow.
episodes.title: Black Wind Howls

episodes.synopsis: As a looming mutiny threatens to take down the Widow, Sunny seeks out the survivor of a mysterious massacre from long ago.
episodes.title: Dragonfly's Last Dance

episodes.synopsis: Sunny and Bajie receive an icy welcome at Pilgrim's fortress. The Widow and Gaius form a risky plan to end the war.
episodes.title: Leopard Catches Cloud

episodes.synopsis: Sunny and Bajie face off with Pilgrim, who lays out his deadly plan for the Badlands. The Widow finds common ground with the Master.
episodes.title: Chamber of the Scorpion

episodes.synopsis: Pilgrim leads the hunt for a gravely wounded Sunny. The Widow confronts her inner demons in an attempt to restore her Gift.
episodes.title: Raven's Feather, Phoenix Blood

episodes.synopsis: Sunny and Nix seek information that could destroy Pilgrim. The Widow and Bajie team up with the Master. M.K. leads Pilgrim to a great source of power.
episodes.title: The Boar and the Butterfly

episodes.synopsis: The Widow and Baron Chau finally face off. M.K. and Pilgrim grow their forces at the Monastery. Sunny and Bajie discover a new foe, the Black Lotus.
episodes.title: Cobra Fang, Panther Claw

episodes.synopsis: Sunny discovers an important figure from his past is working with the Black Lotus. The Widow, Gaius and Tilda bring an end to the bloody civil war.
episodes.title: Black Lotus, White Rose

episodes.synopsis: Sunny, Bajie and Kannin journey back into the Badlands. The Widow makes a risky play against Pilgrim, bringing Cressida and Lydia into the crossfire.
episodes.title: Curse of the Red Rain

episodes.synopsis: Sunny, Bajie and Gaius seek an unlikely ally in the fight against Pilgrim. Cressida has a disturbing revelation. The Widow questions her future.
episodes.title: Requiem for the Fallen

episodes.synopsis: Sunny, The Widow and Bajie lead the charge against Pilgrim, as he attempts to gain ultimate control of the Badlands. M.K. seeks revenge on The Widow.
episodes.title: Seven Strike as One
